youtube.title: Postpartum Tremors Explained: Why New Moms Shake After Birth
youtube.description: Experience the reality of postpartum tremors. This video explains why many women experience involuntary shaking or 'the shakes' immediately after childbirth. Learn why it is common, temporary, and a normal physiological response to hormonal changes and fluid shifts.
